mapper.sql: product_id, start_district_id, lowest_market_price, lowest_saled_price, app_lowest_market_price, app_lowest_saled_price, wap_lowest_market_price, wap_lowest_saled_price, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: select count(1) from T_FITSDP_PRODUCT_SEARCH_INDEX where product_id = #{productId}

SELECT s.product_id, start_district_id, lowest_market_price, lowest_saled_price, app_lowest_market_price, app_lowest_saled_price, wap_lowest_market_price, wap_lowest_saled_price, create_time, update_time, c.DEPARTURE_CITY_NAME AS start_district FROM T_FITSDP_PRODUCT_SEARCH_INDEX s LEFT JOIN T_FITSDP_CITY_GROUP c ON s.START_DISTRICT_ID=c.DEPARTURE_CITY_DISTRICT_ID WHERE s.PRODUCT_ID=c.PRODUCT_ID AND s.PRODUCT_ID=#{productId}
